sentences.en: I couldn't withhold giving some loose to my indignation.
sentences.cn: 我忍不住要发泄一点我的愤怒.

sentences.en: I may withhold the truth at times, but I stop short of actually telling lies.
sentences.cn: 我有时候可能不说真话, 但事实上我不至于到说谎的地步.

sentences.en: I withheld payment until they had completed the work.
sentences.cn: 我扣着钱，直到他们完工。

sentences.en: Ian was accused of withholding vital information from the police.
sentences.cn: 伊恩被控向警方隐瞒重要信息。

sentences.en: It was improper of the broker to withhold the information from the stock exchange.
sentences.cn: 股票经纪人对交易所隐瞒信息的行为是不正当的.

sentences.en: It's never wise to withhold evidence.
sentences.cn: 藏匿证据绝非明智之举。

sentences.en: Most antelopes can withhold their young for weeks, even months.
sentences.cn: 绝大部分羚羊能把分娩期推迟几个星期, 甚至几个月.

sentences.en: Most antelopes, for example, can withhold their young for weeks, even months.
sentences.cn: 例如, 绝大部分羚羊能把分娩期推迟几个星期, 甚至几个月.

sentences.en: Mr Bush says legislators should withhold judgement until they have heard it.
sentences.cn: 布什表示立法者应在听取这个报告后再做判决.

sentences.en: Nixon and Rogers implored them to withhold the sanction.
sentences.cn: 尼克松和罗杰斯规劝他们不要把事情做绝.

sentences.en: Police withheld the dead boy's name yesterday until relatives could be told.
sentences.cn: 警察昨天拒绝在通知亲属前透露死去男孩的名字。

sentences.en: The captain decided to withhold the terrible news even from his officers.
sentences.cn: 船长决定哪怕是对高级船员也要封锁这个可怕的消息。

sentences.en: The dam was too weak to withhold the pressure of the rising water.
sentences.cn: 水坝不够牢固,抵挡不住水上涨的压力.

sentences.en: They neither give nor withhold from their excess.
sentences.cn: 他们既不捐献也不吝啬他们多余的东西.

sentences.en: This section is not authority to withhold information from Congress.
sentences.cn: 本条不得作为拒绝向国会提供情促的根据.

sentences.en: To deduct or withhold ( part of something due ) for an equitable reason.
sentences.cn: 扣除,扣留出于衡平的原因而减去或扣留 ( 到期某物的一部分 )

sentences.en: You are no friend if you withhold from me the truth.
sentences.cn: 如果你不告诉我真相,你就不够朋友.

sentences.en: You have the right to withhold your custom if you so wish.
sentences.cn: 如果你这么不想来，你可以不再光顾。

trans.tran_en: to refuse to give someone something

trans.tran_cn: 拒绝， 不给； 抑制， 阻止； 隐瞒
trans.tran_en: to refuse to give someone something
